synopsis.text:
PErsonal Terminals (PETs) have become a staple in the technologically advanced world of 20XX, connecting everyone to the internet and housing their own artificial intelligence called NetNavis. These NetNavis, designed to protect PETs from viruses and other harmful programs, have gained popularity among users, especially children, who engage in friendly 'Net Battles' to prove their NetNavi's strength.

Enter Netto Hikari, a fifth-grader at Akihara Elementary, who receives a unique NetNavi named Rockman as a gift. Despite Rockman's diminutive size and more responsible demeanor, the two quickly form an unbreakable bond. Along with his classmates Dekao, whose NetNavi is Gutsman, and Meiru, who possesses a custom NetNavi called Roll, Netto engages in thrilling Net Battles, using special battle chips to equip his NetNavi with powerful weapons.

However, the fun and games take a dark turn when an evil organization known as World Three begins using NetNavis to launch terrorist attacks on computer networks. With the digital world under threat, it's up to Rockman, Gutsman, and Roll to put a stop to their nefarious plans and restore peace to the net. Join this dynamic trio as they embark on exciting adventures and strive to become the ultimate Net fighters in "MegaMan: NT Warrior."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
